1: I continually praise the divine forever.
2: I praise you every day and honor your name forever.
3: Celebrate boundless greatness with wholehearted praise.
4: Each generation celebrates and shares mighty deeds with the next.
5: I celebrate majestic honor and wondrous works.
6: I tell of mighty deeds and declare greatness.
7: People celebrate great goodness and sing about righteousness.
8: Choose compassionate patience and generous mercy
9: Kindness reaches everyone; compassion covers all creation.
10: All creation offers praise; the devoted bless.
11: People celebrate a glorious reign and proclaim its power.
12: Make known mighty deeds and the glorious majesty of the kingdom.
13: Timeless reign supports every generation across time.
14: Kindness upholds everyone and lifts the bowed down.
15: Everyone receives nourishment at the proper time.
16: Open hands satisfy the desires of all living beings.
17: Right ways and pure works define every action.
18: Sincere prayer brings the divine close.
19: Reverent hearts have desires fulfilled and prayers answered with rescue.
20: Loving the Divine brings lasting protection
21: All people praise the sacred forever.
